agentAbility.name: Execute
agentAbility.description: Reaper senses weakness and strikes hard: damage from his main gun, secondary gun, or ramming instantly destroys opponents. He can also load a clip of shells for deadlier critical damage, automatically reloaded after each kill.

primaryAttack.name: Autoloader Overheat
primaryAttack.description: Rapid Firing, high-damage shots. Very effective against armored targets but prone to overheating.

tankAbilities.name: High Frequency Jammer
tankAbilities.description: Opponents visible within a set range get Jammed, the longer they stay, the stronger the effect!

tankAbilities.name: Automatic Defense Turret
tankAbilities.description: An autonomous grenade turret targets the largest nearby threats, firing at opponents who are either aiming at the tank or closest to firing a shell.
